column4: hi, i have a USB drive and I'm unable to edit the files on it.
I tried using chown in the terminal, but a message is returned that says 'read-only file system'
why do you want to chown?
also, what is the current ownership and rights?
did you see anything interesting in dmesg?
and bobertdos: i posted my pastebin -  http://pastebin.ca/1226322
I know.  I'm asking you if you see anything interesting relating to your sdb1 there?
yeah, my guess is that that's related to your issues
next step is to google the error
I see some posts recommending a fsck.vfat
and bobertdos: that's what im reading - to do a fsck.vfat
